languages.text: Эхо одобрительных возгласов разносится по кораблю — от капитанского мостика до самых нижних отсеков. Ваши люди готовы следовать за вами хоть в варп, хоть в тьму, хоть в самое пекло. Смерть пиратам, смерть врагам Империума!

traits.locale_text: Эхо одобрительных возгласов разносится по кораблю — от капитанского мостика до самых нижних отсеков. Ваши люди готовы следовать за вами хоть в варп, хоть в тьму, хоть в самое пекло. Смерть пиратам, смерть врагам Империума!

languages.text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!
languages.original_text: Эхо одобрительных возгласов разносится по кораблю — от капитанского мостика до самых нижних отсеков. Ваши люди готовы следовать за вами хоть в варп, хоть в тьму, хоть в самое пекло. Смерть пиратам, смерть врагам Империума!

traits.locale_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the captain's bridge to the lowermost chambers. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, to hell itself. Death to pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the captain's bridge to the lowermost chambers. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, to hell itself. Death to pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the captain's bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, to hell itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the captain's bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, to hell itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the captain's bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, to hell itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

languages.text: 从舰桥到最底层的甲板，整艘船上都回荡着赞许的呼声。你的船员愿意追随你到任何地方，无论是亚空间还是黑暗之中，就算是粉身碎骨也无妨。受死吧，海盗！受死吧，帝国的敌人！
languages.original_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

traits.locale_text: 从舰桥到最底层的甲板，整艘船上都回荡着赞许的呼声。你的船员愿意追随你到任何地方，无论是亚空间还是黑暗之中，就算是粉身碎骨也无妨。受死吧，海盗！受死吧，帝国的敌人！

languages.text: Por toda la nave resuenan gritos de aprobación, desde el puente a las cubiertas inferiores. Tu tripulación te seguirá a cualquier parte: a la disformidad, a la oscuridad, a la aniquilación si hace falta. ¡Muerte a los piratas! ¡Muerte a los enemigos del Imperium!
languages.original_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

traits.locale_text: Por toda la nave resuenan gritos de aprobación, desde el puente a las cubiertas inferiores. Tu tripulación te seguirá a cualquier parte: a la disformidad, a la oscuridad, al mismo infierno si hace falta. ¡Muerte a los piratas! ¡Muerte a los enemigos del Imperium!

languages.text: 艦橋から最下層の甲板まで、船内に賛同の声が響く。クルーはどこへでもついてきてくれる。〈歪み〉へ、暗闇へ、そして虚無でさえへも。海賊たちに死を！〈帝国〉の敵に天誅を！
languages.original_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

traits.locale_text: 艦橋から最下層の甲板まで、船内に賛同の声が響く。クルーはどこへでもついてきてくれる。〈歪み〉へ、暗闇へ、そして地獄でさえへも。海賊たちに死を！〈帝国〉の敵に天誅を！

languages.text: Auf dem ganzen Schiff ertönen von der Brücke bis zu den untersten Decks zustimmende Rufe. Deine Crew folgt dir überall hin: in den Warp, in die Dunkelheit, sogar in die Hölle. Tod den Piraten! Tod den Feinden des Imperiums!
languages.original_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

traits.locale_text: Auf dem ganzen Schiff ertönen von der Brücke bis zu den untersten Decks zustimmende Rufe. Deine Crew folgt dir überall hin: in den Warp, in die Dunkelheit, sogar in die Hölle. Tod den Piraten! Tod den Feinden des Imperiums!

Auf dem ganzen Schiff ertönen zustimmende Rufe, von der Brücke bis hinab zu den untersten Decks. Deine Crew folgt dir überall hin: in den Warp, in die Dunkelheit, sogar in die Hölle. Tod den Piraten! Tod den Feinden des Imperiums!

languages.text: Des exclamations d'approbation résonnent dans tout le vaisseau, de la passerelle de commandement aux ponts inférieurs. Votre équipage vous suivra où que vous alliez : dans le Warp, dans les ténèbres, et jusque dans le néant. Mort aux pirates ! Mort aux ennemis de l'Imperium !
languages.original_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!

traits.locale_text: Des exclamations d'approbation résonnent dans tout le vaisseau, de la passerelle de commandement aux ponts inférieurs. Votre équipage vous suivra où que vous alliez : dans le Warp, dans les ténèbres, et jusqu'en enfer. Mort aux pirates ! Mort aux ennemis de l'Imperium !

languages.text: Onay çığlıkları, köprüden en alt güvertelere kadar gemide yankılanıyor. Mürettebatın peşinden her yere gitmeye hazır: Öteboyuta, karanlığa, yok oluşun kendisine. Korsanlara ölüm! İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarına ölüm!
languages.original_text: Exclamations of approval echo around the ship, from the bridge to the lowermost decks. Your crew will follow you anywhere: into the warp, into darkness, into oblivion itself. Death to the pirates! Death to the enemies of the Imperium!
